Celebrating 13 years in films

Actors and real life couple Riteish and Genelia Deshmukh have completed 13 years of their journey in Hindi films.

The Housefull actor took to Twitter to share a poster of his debut film, which released in 2003.

“Today: 13 Years of Tujhe Meri Kasam — 13 years of @geneliad and me being part of this glorious family #IndianFilmIndusty,” Riteish tweeted on Sunday.

The duo have worked together in films like Masti and Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya and Tujhe Meri Kasam . — IANS
title: Riteish, Genelia clock 13 years in filmdom (Movie Snippets)
